es.utils.mapper.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.utils.mapper.configuration.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends Object
    This class handle the configuration at Mapper level.
    Author:
    eschoysman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Configuration(Mapper mapper)
      Create a configuration associated to the given Mapper instance.

        Parameters:

      • useAnnotation

        public <T extends Annotation> Configuration useAnnotation(Class<T> annotationType)
                                                   throws MappingException
        Allow to customize the annotation used to specify the alias name of a field using the "value" field of the annotation.
        It is equivalent to call addAnnotation(annotationType,null) or addAnnotation(annotationType,"value")
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the annotation
        Parameters:
        annotationType - The type of the annotation
        Returns:
        The current configuration instance
        Throws:
        MappingException - If the fieldName does not exists in the annotation type or if it exists but does not return String or String[].
        See Also:
        useAnnotation(Class, String)

      • useAnnotation

        public <T extends Annotation> Configuration useAnnotation(Class<T> annotationType,
                                                          String fieldName)
                                                   throws MappingException
        Allow to customize the annotation used to specify the alias name of a field using the "fieldName" field of the annotation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the annotation
        Parameters:
        annotationType - The type of the annotation
        fieldName - method name of the annotation containing the alias value to use
        Returns:
        The current configuration instance
        Throws:
        MappingException - If the fieldName does not exists in the annotation type or if it exists but does not return String or String[].
        See Also:
        useAnnotation(Class)

      • getAnnotationField

        public <T extends Annotation> String getAnnotationField(Class<T> annotationType)
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the annotation
        Parameters:
        annotationType - The type of the annotation
        Returns:
        The field of the annotation to use for the alias name of the annotated field

        public Configuration enableDeepCopy()
        Enable the deep copy of the field
        Returns:

        public Configuration disableDeepCopy()
        Disable the deep copy of the field
        Returns:
        The current configuration instance
        See Also:

      • isDeepCopyEnabled

        public boolean isDeepCopyEnabled()
        Returns:
        Returns true only if deepCopy is enabled, false otherwise
        See Also:
        disableDeepCopy(), enableDeepCopy()

      • setCloner

        public <T> Configuration setCloner(UnaryOperator<T> cloner)
        Set to cloner to use if deepCopy is enabled.
        If cloner is not null, deepCopy will be enabled.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Generic type of the cloner operation (just for not having Object)
        Parameters:
        cloner - The cloning operation
        Returns:
        The current configuration instance
        See Also:
        disableDeepCopy(), enableDeepCopy(), getCloner()

      • getCloner

        public <T> UnaryOperator<T> getCloner()
        Type Parameters:
        T - Generic type of the cloner operation (just for not having Object)
        Returns:
        Returns a UnaryOperator that can be used to copy objects. If no cloner was set, it will returns null.
        See Also:
        setCloner(UnaryOperator)

      • setDefaultValueStrategy

        public Configuration setDefaultValueStrategy(DefaultValueStrategy... defaultValuesStrategy)
        Set the logic of the defaultValue strategy.
        Parameters:
        defaultValuesStrategy - array of strategies to use
        Returns:
        The current configuration instance
        See Also:
        hasStrategy(DefaultValueStrategy), DefaultValueStrategy

      • hasStrategy

        public boolean hasStrategy(DefaultValueStrategy strategy)
        Parameters:
        strategy - the strategy to use
        Returns:
        Returns true if the diven defaultValue strategy is set in the configurations, false otherwise
        See Also:
        setDefaultValueStrategy(DefaultValueStrategy...), DefaultValueStrategy
